title: Calendar search is searching only Events not tasks? How to search tasks then?
content:

I always assumed that it search everything in calendar. So how do i search also Tasks or how to convert all to events?

From the beginning i was not told the difference between the Events and Tasks, it is not enough intuitive for me to differentiate the two. https://superuser.com/questions/1321548/thunderbird-add-on-lightning-what-is-the-difference-between-event-and-task

title: "Reply to list" button disabled
content:
On most of the mailing list I'm subscribed to, Thunderbird does disable the "Reply to list" button. And when I click "reply" it does not reply to the list but to the sender, even if "reply to" header is set to the mailing list address. This is happening since Thunderbird with new UI. I write dozens emails daily to those list since 2 decades, this odd behavior has appeared since september or october 2023 I guess.

What is happening ? Why is my work such a pain now ?

title: How to stop Thunderbird from wrapping text in my sent emails?
content:
When I'm sending mails through gmail - they are sent as seen. When I'm sending mails through Thunderbird - it's changing them after I click send. If I want my line to be broken - I'll break it myself. I don't want my emails to be narrow as Italian streets. Especially not silently in background, and I get to know this when someone replies with quote or I check sent mails manually.

There are guides for previous thunderbird versions, but not for Supernova.
creator: acrivec1

title: Chybně se rozbrazující e-maily - pouze některé
content:
Dobrý den,

všimla jsem si již dříve, že se mi chybně zobrazují některé e-maily. V pátek jsem zjistila, že jich je více, jedná se o starší a většinou jsou součástí delšího vlákna, kde se posílalo více e-mailů. Na základě toho, že jsem si jistá, že už se zobrazovali chybně dříve, to určitě není poslední aktualizací.

V příloze zasílám příklad toho, jak se mi maily občas zobrazují. Jejich obsah pak bývá doslova gigantický. Pokaždé chybí předmět i odesílatel. V některých případech se dokonce objevují v těle mailu i obsah, který je z jiných e-mailů a s tím daným nemá absolutně nic společného.

Dokázali byste mi s tím, prosím, pomoci? Nemohu přijít na to, kde je problém a bohužel si s tím neví rady ani firemní programátoři.

Děkuji.

title: [Thunderbird email client] Composing email: Clicking Options > Delivery Status Notification Does Not Work At All!!!
content:
Subject: [Thunderbird email client] Composing email: Clicking Options > Delivery Status Notification Does Not Work At All!!!

Good day from Singapore,

Today is 13 November 2023 Monday Singapore Time 7 PM.

Recently I have installed Thunderbird email client version 115.4.1 (64-bit) SUPERNOVA in Windows 11 Home version 22H2 in my home desktop computer.

I have numerous Gmail email account(s). I do not know whether GMAIL is using Postfix or EXIM Mail Transfer Agent (MTA).

I have composed and SENT emails with the Subject: "Singaporean man who previously attempted to contest in the 2023 Singapore Presidential Elections has applied for refugee status/political asylum in the UK on 23 Oct 2023" to the following international news media outlets, mainly British, American and Hong Kong:

[01] BBC News (UK)

[02] The Guardian (UK)

[03] The Observer (UK)

[04] The Daily Telegraph (UK)

[05] The Sunday Telegraph (UK)

[06] The Washington Post (USA)

[07] The New York Times (USA)

[08] CNN (USA)

[09] Yahoo News

[10] Wired.com (USA)

[11] Vice.com (USA)

[12] Mothership (Singapore)

[13] Must Share News (Singapore)

[14] The Independent (Singapore)

[15] Goodyfeed (Singapore)

[16] Sky News (UK)

[17] The Times (UK)

[18] The Independent (UK)

[19] Channel 4 News (UK)

[20] Daily Mail (UK)

[21] The Sun (UK)

[22] The Mirror (UK)

[23] South China Morning Post (Hong Kong)

[24] Financial Times (UK)

[25] Reuters (UK) - I am going to send email soon, but it seems Reuters don't have email addresses, only contact submission forms on its official website

[26] Agence France-Press (France) - I am going to send email soon, but it seems AFP don't have email addresses, only contact submission forms on its official website

Before sending each email, I will click Options > Delivery Status Notification in Thunderbird email client. I will ENSURE this option is clicked, besides clicking Return Receipts.

However, I have NEVER received any Delivery Status Notification for the emails that I have sent. Not even once. Though I have received Return Receipts, but they are very FEW.

Questions:

[1] Is there a bug with Thunderbird email client?

---OR---

[2] Did the Singapore Government have unfettered access and absolute control of all my email accounts? Were my outgoing emails to the above international news media outlets intercepted and deleted by the Singapore Government before they reach their recipients? Hence the above-mentioned international news media outlets have NEVER received my emails???

Many years ago, I think it was during General Election 2011 in Singapore, I think it was Mr. Tan Jee Say, who told me that the Singapore Government has secret/covert access to all the email accounts of all Singaporeans.

Why is the Singapore Government so scared to let the whole world know that Singapore Citizen Mr. Teo En Ming has flown from Singapore to London (transit in Shanghai, China) on 22 Oct 2023 Sunday and claimed refugee status / political asylum in the United Kingdom on 23 Oct 2023?

After the British Government has fully paid for my free Singapore Airlines SQ321 flight (because I only have about/approximately SGD$2400 in my bank accounts on 23 Oct 2023) and sent me back to Singapore from London Heathrow Airport (I was transferred from London Gatwick Airport to London Heathrow Airport) on a 12-hour flight on 23 Oct 2023, I saw someone (not me) had created a forum thread/topic at Hardwarezone Singapore Eat-Drink-Man-Woman (EDMW) forums with the title, something like:

"BREAKING Teo En Ming has claimed refugee in the UK on 23 Oct 2023..."

However, after 5 pages of forum discussion (I think), the administrators or moderators of Hardwarezone Singapore forums had QUICKLY deleted the above forum thread/topic. Maybe due to pressure from the Singapore Government. Maybe due to pressure from the Singapore Government.

I didn't see the actual forum thread/topic itself. What I saw was the Google Cache of the deleted forum topic. But now the Google Cache is also gone, I think.

Why is the Singapore Government so scared to let the whole world know that Singapore Citizen Mr. Teo En Ming has flown from Singapore to London (transit in Shanghai, China) on 22 Oct 2023 Sunday and claimed refugee status / political asylum in the United Kingdom on 23 Oct 2023?

Or is it a bug with Thunderbird email client that I have never received any Delivery Status Notification for the emails that I have sent out to the above international news media outlets?

Or was there a problem with the GMAIL SMTP servers?? Problem with Postfix MTA? Problem with Exim MTA? Problem with Sendmail MTA?

Why is the Singapore Government so scared to let the whole world know that Singapore Citizen Mr. Teo En Ming has flown from Singapore to London (transit in Shanghai, China) on 22 Oct 2023 Sunday and claimed refugee status / political asylum in the United Kingdom on 23 Oct 2023?

Mr. Teo En Ming has previously applied for political asylum / refugee status at the [1] United Nations Refugee Agency UNHCR Bangkok (21-22 March 2017), [2] in Taiwan on 5 Aug 2019 and [3] in Australia (application by email through the Australian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur) on 10 March 2020. But they were never reported in the news anywhere at all.

There is widespread news coverage on Amos Yee, who had offended Singapore Minister Mentor Lee Kuan Yew 8 years ago in 2015. Mr. Teo En Ming had also offended Singapore Minister Mentor Lee Kuan Yew 16 years ago in 2007, many many years before Amos Yee did. So I don't understand why the Singapore Government is so scared to have widespread news coverage of Mr. Teo En Ming. Why can't the Singapore Government let millions and billions of people know Mr. Teo En Ming???????

Regards,

Mr. Turritopsis Dohrnii Teo En Ming Targeted Individual in Singapore

title: Thunderbird (Windows 10 Professional) - come inviare file da esplora risorse
content: Un caro saluto a tutti. Premessa: utilizzo Mozilla Thunderbird come programma predefinito di posta elettronica. Ho un quesito da porvi; mi capita spesso di inviare uno (o più file) che ho nella mia cartella documenti. Per farlo clicco con il tasto destro del mouse sul file da me prescelto quindi ---> invia a ---> destinatario di posta. A questo punto ci sono due possibilità; se il programma client è chiuso si apre un nuovo messaggio con l'allegato ma immediatamente dopo si apre Thunderbird nascondendo sotto il messaggio che intendo completare ed inviare; se invece il programma client è aperto il messaggio rimane sulla barra delle applicazioni. In entrambe i casi devo cliccare ancora una volta sul messaggi e quindi proseguire. La mia richiesta è questa: è possibile mantenere in primo piano il messaggio che intendo completare ed inviare? (Credo fosse una funzione presente sul vecchio Outlook Express). Grazie a chi mi vorrà dare suggerimenti.

content:
I have read the Thunderbird help file on IMAP Synchronization but I do not have the options shown on the screenshot (I am using the latest TB v.115.4.2 (32-bit).

Let's say that I want to download all messages (read or unread) with (or without) attachments for the last 365 days: The Synchronization & Storage Settings settings show: 1. Message Synchronizing - Keep messages in all folders for this account on this computer Does that refer to the header Synchronization? 2. Disk Space - To save disk space, downloading messages from the server and keeping local copies for offline use can be restricted by age or size. When/how are the messages downloaded?

Where in the profile are the local headers stored?

Sorry for a lot of questions. TIA!

title: The folder-tree and message list need separate row height settings
content:
TB Supernova View/Density setting requires the same spacing to be applied to both the Folder Tree and the Message List/Thread Pane (at least in Windows classic table view. 

It should be obvious that much more space is required to see and track a message list that changes every minute and can grow to dozens of items, while a much less spacious view can be used to see and track a folder-tree that seldom changes and is usually much shorter [and because it's more compressed it can all be seen in most cases without any need for scrolling] . 
This WAS obvious to the TB community. For decades , previous versions of Thunderbird showed the Folder Tree in a compact view  where row height was differnt from, and much more compressed than, the row height in the Message List / Threads Pane.

This request can can be met in two ways. Please either 1) Allow the View/Density settings to apply independently to the Folder-tree and the Message List (at least for Windows table view); OR 2) Compress the row height for the Folder-Tree pane to fixed "Compact" setting like it used to be, with View/Density options changing nly bold textthe Message List / Thread Pane in table view. Thank you.

title: Not downloading emails from one  (my main) single account among many.
content:
Hi

I've used Thunderbird (32bit) for years with no major problems but when someone sent me an "Invite" it was just a blank email that I got. The program said it was up to date (v68 I think) but I then discovered that the 64bit version was up to v115 and it had the necessary "calendar" (to see these Invites) built into it so I installed it and everything seemed to be fine after the upgrade except that I lost my Address Book (all the websites I saw said the upgrade would "handle" everything and none warned that Address Book should be exported BEFORE upgrading!), however, just from yesterday, TB has stopped downloading messages from (just) ONE of my ntlworld.com accounts!

When I click 'Get Messages' and look at the bottom I see it accessing all the accounts I have EXCEPT the main one I use!

Now, recently, for some unknown reason, Virgin Media LOCKED this mail account and I had to go through a whole load of palaver to get it up and running again! This, of course, involved accepting a new, ridiculously complex, password for the mail account but I did all that and once I had entered the new password into TB, the account worked fine all of last week.

However, as of yesterday, TB has stopped even trying to fetch the mail from the ntlworld server associated with my main email address (it gets the messages from my other ntlworld addresses no problem) and I can still SEND emails from my main ntlworld address!

I looked in the saved passwords and noted that the new password is there against the smtp.ntlworld.com linked to this email address but there is no sign of a pop3.ntlworld.com line for this account or the associated password!

I can find no advice on how to manually add in this account and its password for a pop3 server and wondered if that was why TB was not downloading messages from that server/account anymore?

I have already tried deleting popstate.dat for the a/c in question and even tried deleting global-messages-db.sqlite (which meant I had to go into EVERY webmail for ALL of my accounts and delete ALL the messages in them to avoid the possibility of re-downloading thousands of emails!!!) but my suspicion is that the account not being listed in the saved passwords (just for pop3, the smtp password is there alongside this email address) is the root of the problem.

TB doesn't ASK me for a password for this account when getting messages it just doesn't attempt to fetch them from that account/server at all! (Everything is all properly set up & the account IS 'ticked' to be included when getting mail!)

Any ideas what the problem (actually) is and how to fix it? Any help is much appreciated, thank you.
creator: wb.cameron

title: Folders open in the middle of the list when sorted by date
content:
After the latest Thunderbird update to 115.4.2 (64-bit), when I open any folder to view emails, the place I land is now the middle of the list, even though it is sorted by date and the last email I looked at was the most recent.

This means every time I open any folder, I have to scroll through half the list to the latest emails. For example, the folder opens to emails from 2020 and have to scroll to 2023, every time.

Usually, if I open a folder I land on the most recent emails and this what I would like to set it back to doing, but I have looked for this setting and cannot find it.

Are there any solutions or suggestions to try?
